verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fourth \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fourth \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Chislev|strong="H3691"\w*.\f + \fr 7:1 \ft Chislev is the ninth month of the Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of November and December.\f*

\w Now|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* people \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Sharezer|strong="H8272"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Regem-melech|strong="H7278"\w*, \w along|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* men,\f + \fr 7:2 \ft Or Bethel-sharezer had sent Regem-melech, along with his men,\f* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w plead|strong="H2470"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*

\w by|strong="H8141"\w* asking \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* well \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, “\w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fast \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w many|strong="H4100"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“Ask \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, ‘\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w months|strong="H7637"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w was|strong="H8141"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w really|strong="H2088"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Me|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*?

\w And|strong="H8354"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* were eating \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*, were \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w doing|strong="H8354"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* simply \w for|strong="H3588"\w* yourselves?

\w Are|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H7121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earlier|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H5439"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* populous \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w prosperous|strong="H7961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Negev|strong="H5045"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w foothills|strong="H8219"\w* \f + \fr 7:7 \ft Hebrew Shephelah or lowlands; that is, the western foothills of Judea\f* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*?’”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Administer|strong="H6213"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*. \w Show|strong="H6213"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \f + \fr 7:9 \ft Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7356"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* another.

Do \w not|strong="H2803"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* \w the|strong="H6231"\w* widow \w or|strong="H1616"\w* \w the|strong="H6231"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w the|strong="H6231"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w* \w or|strong="H1616"\w* \w the|strong="H6231"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*. \w And|strong="H6041"\w* do \w not|strong="H2803"\w* \w plot|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H1616"\w* \w your|strong="H6231"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w against|strong="H3824"\w* \w one|strong="H6041"\w* \w another|strong="H7451"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3513"\w* \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w attention|strong="H7181"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stubborn|strong="H5637"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*; \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w stopped|strong="H3513"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* ears \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w*.\f + \fr 7:11 \ft Hebrew they made their ears too heavy to hear\f*

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w flint|strong="H8068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w His|strong="H7760"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w earlier|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w anger|strong="H7110"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* just \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*, says \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w scattered|strong="H5590"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5590"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H7725"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w* \w behind|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w*. \w Thus|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* land \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*.”
